theme.label: Theme
theme.description: Choose between light and dark appearance

language.label: Language
language.description: Select the display language for the application

autoExclude.label: Auto-exclude on deploy
autoExclude.description: Automatically add the file to .git/info/exclude when creating a deployment. If disabled, you can add it manually later from the deployment card.

tags.label: Manage tags
tags.description: View and delete tags. Tags in use by files will remain assigned until removed manually.

appData.label: Application data
appData.description: Location where the application stores its database and file versions

changeDialog.title: Change data location
changeDialog.copyDbHint: Copy the existing database to the new location
changeDialog.copyFilesHint: Copy all file version history to the new location
changeDialog.restartWarning: The application will restart to apply the change

appData.resetConfirm: Reset to default location? The application will restart.

export.label: Export data
export.description: Export all application data to a backup file
export.error: An error occurred while exporting data

import.label: Import data
import.description: Import application data from a backup file
import.error: An error occurred while importing data
import.confirm: Are you sure you want to import this data? Existing data will be replaced.
